manzils.text: Qaf and the Glorious Qur'an
They marveled that someone from among their midst has come to them with a warning. The unbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing
Once We have died and become dust? That is a most unlikely return
We know how many of them the earth consumes, and We keep a comprehensive record [about each one of them]
But when the Truth came to them, they denied it; they are in a state of confusion
Have they not looked at the sky above them, how We structured it, and beautified it with all its gateways
And the earth, how We spread it out and placed on it firm mountains, and made every beautiful pair of plants grow in it
This is an insight and a reminder to every worshiper who willingly turns to God
And We sent down blessed rain from the sky and grew gardens and grain to harvest
And soaring palm trees, with clustered dates
as provision for the worshipers. By it [the rain] We gave life to a dead town. This is how the emergence [from the graves] will take place
Before them the people of Noah denied the truth, and so did the dwellers of Rass, Thamud
Aad, Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot
the woods-dwellers and the people of Tubba'. All of these people rejected their messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled
Were We exhausted by the first creation? But they are dubious of a new creation
We have created man and We know what his inner soul is whispering. We are closer to him than his jugular vein
as he receives the two recording agents, seated one on the right and one on the left
He does not utter any word, without a vigilant observer present with him
Eventually, the trance of death will come with the Truth. This is what you were trying to evade
The Horn will be blown. This is the Promised Day
Every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness
You did not pay much attention to this day, but as We lifted your veil from you, your vision today is keen
His inseparable companion, will say, "This is what I have recorded
[God will say], "Cast into Hell everyone who stubbornly denied the truth
everyone who prevented good from reaching others, aggressor, who caused others to doubt
who made other gods as equal with God; then cast him into severe punishment
His [evil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself], was extremely lost
[God] will say, "Do not feud in My presence, when I had warned you in advance
My judgment, once given, is not subject to change and I do not wrong My servants
On the Day We will say to Hell, "Are you full?" And it will say, "Are there some more
And Paradise will be brought near to those who were ever mindful of God, it will not be far
[It will be said], "This is what you were promised. for every repentant, keeper of his covenant with God
who feared the Merciful although He was beyond his perception and came with a repenting heart
Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity
Whatever they want there, they will have and with Us is still more
How many a generation We destroyed before them, who were more powerful and had searched every land. Was there any escape
There is a reminder in this for whoever has a heart or cared to listen and witness
And We did create the heavens and earth and everything between them in six days, and We were not the least weary
So [Prophet] endure what they say and praise your Lord's limitless glory before the rising of the sun and before its setting
and glorify Him part of the night and after prostration
Listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near
The Day they will hear the blast in all Truth, that is the Day of Emergence [from the graves]
It is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is their final destination
The Day when the earth cracks as they emerge rapidly; That is an easy gathering for Us
We know best what they say, and you are not there to force them. So remind with the Quran those who fear My warning
By those [winds] scattering dust
and those heavily laden [with water]
and those sailing with ease
and those distributing [rain] as ordained
what you are promised is true
The judgment will come
By the sky that is woven
you differ in what you say [about this message]
He who deceives himself is misled away from it
The speculators destroy themselves
they are unaware that they are lost in ignorance
They ask, "When is the Day of Judgment
The Day they will be tested when they see the Fire
[And will be told], "Taste your scheme. This is what you were rushing toward
While those who were mindful of God will be among Gardens and springs
accepting what their Lord has given them. Verily, they were those who do good
They used to sleep a little at night
and at dawn they would pray for forgiveness
and assign a share of their wealth to the needy and the deprived
For the certain [in faith], they are signs on earth
and in yourselves, will you not see
And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised
By the Lord of the heaven and earth, it is as true as the fact that you speak
Has the story of Abraham's honored guests reached you
When they entered to see him, they said, "Peace." He answered, "Peace to you strangers
Then he went off to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
and placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat
He then began to feel apprehensive. They said, "Do not fear," and gave him good news of a boy who would be gifted with knowledge
His wife approached with a scream, struck her face and protested, "A barren old woman [like me]
They said, "Thus said your Lord; He is the All-Wise, the All-knowing
[Abraham] then enquired, "What is your business, messengers
They said, " We have been sent to a dissenting people
to send down on them rocks of clay
marked by your Lord for those who rejected His messages and have severed all relations with God
So We brought out the believers that were in town
But found only one household of people who submitted to God
And We left in town a sign for those who fear the painful punishment
There is another sign in Moses, when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority
But Pharaoh turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman
So We seized him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea. Pharaoh was to blame
And a sign in Aad, when We unleashed against them the devastating wind
It spared nothing it came upon, and left it like decayed ruins
And a sign in Thamud, it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a while
But they defied their Lord's command, so the thunderbolt struck them as they looked
They were unable to rise, nor could they find help
And before that the people of Noah. They were wicked people
We built the universe with power, and We are steadily expanding it
And the earth We spread it out, How well We smoothed it out
And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will reflect
So flee towards God. I am sent from Him with a clear warning for you
And do not set up any other god with God. I come to you with a clear warning from Him
Similarly, every time a messenger came to those before them, they said, "A magician or a madman
Did they recommend it to one another? Rather, they are people full of tyranny
So turn away from them, you are not to blame
And go on reminding them. It is good for the believers to be reminded
I only created jinn and human beings to worship Me
I do not require any provision from them, nor do I require them to feed Me
It is God who is the Provider to all, the Possessor of Power, the Strong
Those who were unjust have their share of bad deeds just like their predecessors, so let them not rush My punishment
How terrible for the unbelievers their Day which they are promised
By the mountain called Al Tur
and [by] a Book inscribed
In a wide open parchment
and [by] the frequented House
and [by] the canopy raised high
and [by] the surf-swollen sea
the punishment of your Lord will occur
Nothing can prevent it
On the Day heaven sways with agitation
and the mountains shift about
how terrible it is that Day, for the unbelievers
who are chatting carelessly to amuse themselves
The Day they are forcefully shoved into the fire of Hell
This is the Fire which you didn't believe in
Is this magic, or do you still not see
Burn in it. Then be patient or impatient, it is all the same for you. You are only being repaid for what you have done
Those who were mindful of God will be in Gardens and bliss
rejoicing in what their Lord has given them. For their Lord has spared them the suffering of Hell
Eat and drink enjoyably, a reward for what You have done
Reclining on luxurious furniture, beautifully arranged laced, We will pair them with Hoor Ein

Those who believed and whose offspring followed them in faith, We will unite them with their offspring without depriving anybody of their reward for their deeds. Each one according to what he has earned
And We will provide them with any fruit and meat they desire
They pass around a cup which does not lead to either idle talk, or sin
Circulating among them to serve them, will be youths like hidden pearls
They will approach one another, wondering
they will say "When we were previously among our families we used to live in fear
But God blessed us, and spared us the suffering of the Scorching Fire
Before this, we used to pray to Him. It is He who is the Most Kind, the Merciful-to-all
So go on reminding.By the grace of your Lord, you are neither an oracle nor a madman
Or do they say [of you], "He's only a poet let's wait to see what time will do to him
Say, "Go on waiting, I will be waiting with you
Or is it their dreams compelling them to say this? Or are they people full of tyranny
Or do they say, "He has simply made it up?" Rather, they do not want to believe
Then let them produce something like it, if they are truthful
Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators
Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In truth, they are not certain of anything
Or do they possess your Lord's treasuries? Or do they have control over them
Or do they have a stairway [into the heaven] to climb and eavesdrop? Then let their eavesdropper produce clear proof
Or does He have daughters while you have sons
Or do you demand a wage from them that would burden them with debt
Or if they know the future, so they write [it] down
Or are they plotting against you? The plot will fall back on the unbelievers
Or do they have a god other than God? May He be exalted in His glory. God is far above anything they associate with Him
Even if they were to see a piece the sky falling, they would say, "Just a heap of clouds
So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be stunned
the Day when their plotting will not do them any good, nor will they be helped
Another punishment awaits the unjust, but most of them are unaware of it
So wait patiently for your Lord's judgment, for you are before Our eyes. And praise your Lord of limitless glory when you arise
And glorify Him at night, and at the time when the stars retreat
By the falling star
your friend has not strayed, nor has he erred
Nor does he speak from his own whims
It is a revealed revelation
taught to him by one with mighty powers
and splendor who stood still
while he was at the highest horizon
Then he drew near coming down
to within two bows' length or closer
Then God [through that angel] revealed to His servant what He revealed
The heart did not doubt what it saw
Do you dispute with him what he saw
Indeed, he saw him in another descent
at the Sidra beyond which none may pass
near the Garden of Refuge
where that Sidra was shrouded [in mystery] with what shrouded it
The eye did not waver, nor did it exceed its limit
He saw some of the greatest signs of his Lord
So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza
and Manat, the third, the other one
Why do you chose for yourself male offspring and assign to God the female
That, then, is an unfair distribution

These [allegedly divine beings] are nothing but names, which you [who worship them] and your forefathers have invented. God sent no authority for them. They [who worship them] follow nothing but guesswork and their egotistical whims, although guidance has come to them [your people] from their Lord
Should man have whatever he wishes for
when this life and the life to come belong only to God
There are many angels in the heavens whose intercession is of no benefit at all until God gives permission to whomever He wills, and approves
Those who do not believe in the Hereafter give the angels female names
they have no knowledge of this. They only follow guesswork. Guesswork is no substitute at all for the Truth
So pay no attention to whoever turns away from Our message and desires only this worldly life
That is the extent of their knowledge. Your Lord knows best who strayed from His path, and He knows best who is guided
To God belongs everything in the heavens and on earth. He will repay those who do evil according to their deeds, and reward those who do good with the best

those who avoid major sins and indecencies, except for minor lapses excepted; your Lord's forgiveness is vast. He knows you well, ever since He created you from the earth and ever since you were embryos in your mothers' wombs. So do not attest to your own virtues; He knows best those who are mindful of Him
Have you seen the one who turned away
and gave a little and then held back
Does he have knowledge of all that is beyond, enabling him to see the future
Or has he not been told what was in the scrolls of Moses
and [of] Abraham, who fulfilled his duty
that no bearer of burdens will bear the burdens of another
that a human being attains only what he strives for
and that his striving will be seen
Then he will receive for it the fullest reward
The ultimate end is to your Lord
that It is He who causes [one] to laugh and weep
That it is He who causes death and gives life
that He creates the two mates - the male and female
from a fertilized ovum following ejaculation
that the next creation is incumbent upon Him
That it is He who enriches and impoverishes
that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius
that it is He who destroyed the first people of Aad
and Thamud. He spared no one
And before that the people of Noah who were most unjust and most oppressive
That it is He who brought down the ruined cities
And covered them by that whatever He covered them
Which then of your Lord's blessings do you doubt
This is a warning just like the earlier warnings
The inevitable Day draws near
No one, besides God, can disclose it
Do you marvel at this discourse
And you laugh and do not weep
While you are lost in your playfulness
So bow down before God and worship [Him]
The Hour has come near, and the moon has split
If they see a sign, they turn away and say, "same old magic
They rejected the truth and followed their desires. But everything has its time
Stories to warn them have already come, that should have restrained them
Profound Wisdom, yet these warnings had no effect
So, turn away from them. The Day the Caller calls to something terrible
with their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were swarming locusts
scrambling towards the Caller. The unbelievers will cry, "This is a disastrous Day
Before them the people of Noah rejected the truth, they rejected Our servant saying, "A madman," and he was rebuked
So he called upon his Lord, "I am overwhelmed, [please] help me
So We opened the floodgates of heaven with torrential rain
made the earth burst with gushing springs, and the waters met for an already destined purpose
And We carried him on a craft of planks and nails
sailing before our watchful eyes, a reward for him who was rejected
We left it as a sign, who then is willing to take it to heart
How terrible was My punishment and My warning
Hence, We made it easy to understand this Qur'an and to remember it. Who, then, is willing to keep it in mind
The people of Aad rejected the truth. How then was My punishment and My warning
We unleashed upon them a screaming wind, on a day of continuous catastrophe
plucking people away, as if they were trunks of uprooted palm trees
How terrible was My punishment and My warning
Hence, We made it easy to bear this Qur'an in mind. Who, then, is willing to keep it in mind
The people of Thamud rejected the warnings
They said, "Are we to follow a human being, one of us? We would then be misguided and quite insane
Why should he alone from among all of us be chosen to receive the message? He is nothing but a wicked liar
They will know tomorrow who the wicked liar is
We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. Just watch them and be patient
Tell them that the water is to be shared between them, with each share equitably apportioned
But they called their friend, who dared to slaughter [her]
How then was My punishment and My warning
We released against them a single blast, and they became like crumbling twigs
Hence, We made it easy to bear this Qur'an in mind. Who, then, is willing to keep it in mind
The people of Lot rejected the warnings
We unleashed upon them a shower of stones, except for the family of Lot; We rescued them before dawn
as a blessing from us. Thus We reward those who are thankful
Lot had already warned them of Our assault, but they dismissed the warning
They even lusted for his guest, so We blinded their eyes. "Taste My punishment and [the fulfillment of] My warnings
Early morning brought them enduring punishment
So taste My punishment [which is the fulfillment of] My warning
Hence, We made it easy to bear this Qur'an in mind. Who, then, is willing to keep it in mind
The people of Pharaoh also received warnings
They rejected all Our signs, so We seized them as only the Almighty, the Dominant will
Are those among you who deny the truth any better than these others, or do you have immunity in the Books
Or do they say, "We are united and bound to win
They will all be defeated, and they will turn their backs and flee
Rather the Hour is their appointed time and the Hour is more disastrous and bitter
Those who force others to reject God's messages are misguided and insane
The Day when they are dragged on their faces into the fire: "Taste the scorching touch of Saqar
We have created all things in precise measure
Our command is but one word, like a twinkling of an eye
And We have already destroyed the likes of you. Who, then, is willing to take heed
Everything they have done is noted in their records
Every action small or big is written down
Those who are mindful of God will be among Gardens and rivers
In a seat of honor in the presence of a Sovereign who determines all things
The Merciful-to-all
taught the Qur'an
created man
taught him articulate speech
The sun and the moon run on precise calculations
The stars and the trees submit to Him
The skies, He raised high and has established the balance
That you may not transgress in the balance
but weigh with justice, and do not violate the balance
The earth, He laid out for all living creatures
In it are fruits, and date-palms in clusters
And grains on flourishing stems and fragrant plants
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
He created Humankind from dry clay, ringing like pottery
And He created the jinn from a fusion of fire
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
He is Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
He merged the two seas, converging together
with a barrier they do not over run between them
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
From out of both comes pearl and coral
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
His are all floating objects, raised above the sea like mountain peaks
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Everyone on it is perishing
but forever will remain the Face of your Lord, full of Majesty and Glory
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
To Him turn everyone in the heavens and on earth for their needs; and every day He manifests Himself in yet another way
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
We will soon attend to your judgment, you burdensome two
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Jinn and Humankind, if you are able to break through the confines of the heavens and earth, then break through them. You will not break through except with authority
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
A flash of fire and brass will be sent against you, and you will not be helped
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
On that Day, no human and no jinn will be asked about his sins
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Those who forced others to reject Our messages, will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the foreheads and the feet
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
This is Hell, which those who forced others to reject Our messages denied
They will circulate them between fire and scalding water
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
But for he who feared to be one day in the Presence of his Lord are two Gardens
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
With shading branches
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
In them are two flowing springs
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
and they have pairs of every kind of fruits
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
They will be reclining on couches lined with silk brocade, and the fruit of the two Gardens are near at hand
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
In them are creature-mates of modest gaze, untouched before them by man or jinn
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
As though they were rubies and coral
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Will the reward for goodness be anything but goodness
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
And beneath them are two other gardens
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Dark green
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
With two gushing springs
So which of your Lord's blessings do you both deny
In them are fruits, date-palms and pomegranates
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
In them are sweet and lovely creatures
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Hoor, kept close in their pavilions
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Untouched before them by man or jinn
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets
So which of your Lord's blessings will you deny
Blessed be the name of your Lord, full of Majesty and Glory
When the Inevitable Event occurs
no one will deny its occurrence
Lowering some and raising others
When the earth is shaken violently
and the mountains are crushed and crumble
and become scattered dust
then you [human beings] will be divided into three separate groups
Those on the right. What of those on the right
And those on the left. What of those on the left
And those who are ahead upfront
they are the ones brought near
in the Gardens of Bliss
They are a large group of the earlier generations
and a few of later generations
They recline on luxurious woven couches
Reclining on them, facing each other
circulating among them will be ever youthful beings
with vessels, pitchers and a cup of a pure drink
causing no headache and no intoxication
There will be a selection of fruits
and any bird meat they desire
and Hoor Ein
like well-protected pearls
a reward for what they used to do
They will hear no idle or sinful talk there
only the greeting: "Peace, peace
Those on the right, what of those on the right
[They will be] among thorns free lotus trees
and fruit-laden acacias
and extended shade
outpouring water
abundant fruits
neither withheld nor forbidden
on elevated daybeds
We have specially created them
originals
perfectly created and perfectly matching
For those of the right
a group of the earlier generation
and a group of the later generation
Those of the left, what of those on the left
[They will be] amidst scorching fire and scalding water
and a shade of black smoke
neither cool nor refreshing
They used to live luxuriously
but they persisted in the greatest offenses against God
And they used to say, "When we're dead and turned to dust and bones, shall we then be resurrected
and our forefathers too
Say, "The former and the later people
will all be gathered on a predetermined Day
Then you, you who are misguided and reject the truth
will be eating from trees of Zaqqum
You will be filling your bellies with it
drinking boiling water on top of it
drinking it like thirsty camels
That will be their welcome on Judgment Day
We created you, so why you do not believe
Have you seen the semen which you ejaculate
Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator
We have decreed death among you, and nothing can stop Us
if We want to replace you and to recreate you in a way that you know nothing about
You have already known the first creation, so will you not remember
Have you seen what you cultivate
Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower
If We wish, We can turn it into ruins, and you would be left to wonder
[Saying], "we are now in debt
Rather, We have been deprived
And have you seen the water that you drink
Is it you who sent it down from the clouds, or are We the Sender
If We wish, We can make it bitter, why then you are not grateful
And have you seen the fire that you kindle
Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the Producer
We have made it a reminder and provision for all who kindle it
exalt, then, the glory of your Lord's Name; the Magnificent
I swear by the positioning of the stars
a tremendous oath, if you only knew
it is a noble Qur'an
kept in a well-protected record
where none will be allowed to touch it except the purified
revealed gradually by the Lord of the worlds
Is it then this statement that you are ridiculing
and you deny it as if your livelihood depends on it
Why then, when the soul at death reaches the throat
and you are at that time looking on
when we're closer to him than you are, but you do not see
Why then, if you are not dependent on Us
don't you restore his soul back to him, if your claim is true
If the deceased was of those brought near to God
he will then have eternal harmony, eternal delight and a Garden of Bliss
And if he was from those on the right
then "Peace be to you, from your companions on the right
But if he was from those who called the truth a lie and were misguided
he will be welcomed with boiling water
and will burn in Hell
This is the certain Truth
exalt, then, the glory of your Lord's name; the Magnificent
Everything in the heavens and earth exalts God's limitless glory. He is the Almighty, the Wise
The Kingdom of the heavens and earth belongs to Him. He gives life and causes death, and He is able to do all things
He is the First and the Last, the Outer and the Inner, and He has knowledge of all things

It is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days, then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what comes out of it, and what descends from the heaven and what ascends to it. He is with you wherever you may be. God sees everything you do
The Kingdom of the heavens and the earth belongs to Him. All matters are referred back to God
He merges the night into the day and merges the day into the night. He knows what is in your hearts
Believe in God and His Messenger and give out from that with which He has entrusted you. Those among the believers who give will have a great reward
Why would you not believe in God, when the Messenger is inviting you to believe in your Lord and He has received a pledge from you, if you are believers
It is He who sends down clear revelations to His servant, that He may bring you out from the darkness of ignorance into enlightenment. God is kind to you and Merciful-to-all

And why shouldn't you spend in the cause of God, when the inheritance of the heavens and the earth belongs to God? Those of you who contributed before the conquest, and fought, are not equal to those who contributed and fought afterwards. They are higher in rank. But God promises both a good reward. God is All-Aware of what you do
Who will make a loan of goodness to God, so that He may multiply it for him and reward him generously

On the Day when you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding ahead of them and to their right, "Good news for you today: Gardens with rivers flowing through them, where you will remain eternally. That is the great victory

On the Day, the hypocritical men and hypocritical women will say to the believers, "Wait for us. Let us have some of your light." They will be told, "Go back and look for light." And a wall will be raised between them with a gate in it; inside it there is mercy, but outside lies punishment

The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you allowed yourselves to be tempted, and waited and doubted, deceived by wishful thinking until God's command came and the Deceiver deceived you about God
Today no ransom will be accepted from you, nor from those who rejected the truth. Your home is the Fire. It is most worthy of you. What a miserable destination

Is it not time for those believers hearts to become humbly submissive to the remembrance of God and to the Truth He has sent down? So they are not like those who were given the Book before them, whose time was extended but whose hearts hardened, and many of them are wicked
Know that God revives the earth after it dies. We made clear to you the signs; that you may comprehend
For charitable men and women who have loaned God a loan of goodness, it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a generous reward

Those who believed in God and His Messengers are the truthful ones who will bear witness before their Lord. They will have their reward and their light. But the unbelievers and those who reject Our revelations will be the inhabitants of Hell

Know that the life of this world is just a game; recreation, glitter, boasting to one another and rivalry in wealth and children. It is like a rain that helps plants grow, pleasing the growers, but then it dries up and you see it turn yellow, then it becomes stubble. There is severe punishment in the Hereafter, as well as forgiveness from God and [His] approval. The life of this world is only an illusion

So pursue forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden as vast as the heavens and the earth is prepared for [or 'awaits'] those who believed in God and His Messengers. That is the blessing of God which He gives to whom He wills. God is limitless in His blessings
No misfortune occurs, either on earth or in your souls but it is recorded in a Book even before We make it happen. That is easy for God
So you will not grieve for what you missed or rejoice over what He has given you. For God does not like the vain and the arrogant
those who are stingy and direct others to be stingy. Whoever turns away, [remember] God is rich beyond need, worthy of all praise

We sent Our Messengers with clear evidence and We sent down with them the Book and the Balance, that people may establish justice. And We sent down iron, which can be used for military might and to benefit people in many different ways. So that God may know those who uplifted Him and His Messengers though He is beyond their senses. God is All-Powerful, Almighty
We sent Noah and Abraham and placed prophethood and the Book among some of their descendants. Some of them were guided, but many were wicked

Then We sent Our Messengers to follow in their footsteps and followed up with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. We placed compassion and mercy in the hearts of those who followed him. As for monasticism, which they invented to seek God's pleasure, We did not ordain for them, and they did not observe properly. So We gave those who believed among them their reward, but many of them are wicked

Believers, be ever mindful of God and believe in His Messenger; He will give you a double share of His mercy, provide you a light to guide you and forgive you; God is Ever Forgiving and Merciful-to-all

That the people of the Book may know that they have no power whatsoever over God's blessings, and that all blessings are in God's Hand; He gives it to whomever He wills. God is limitless with His blessings
God has heard the words of the woman who argued with you concerning her husband, while complaining to God. God heard your conversation. God is All-Hearing, All-Seeing

There are those of you who divorce their wives by equating them with their mothers, they are not their mothers. Their mothers are those who gave birth to them. What they said is wrong and a blatant lie. But God is All-Pardoning and All-Forgiving

Those of you who divorce your wives by equating them with your mothers, then wish to go back on what you said, must set free a slave before they touch one another. This is what you are instructed to do, and God is well aware of what you do

But he who does not find the means, must fast for two months consecutively before touching one another. And if he is unable, then he should feed sixty needy people. This is to affirm your faith in God and His Messenger. These are the limits set by God. And the unbelievers will have a painful punishment
Those who oppose God and His Messenger will be restrained, like those before them. We have sent down self-evident messages. The unbelievers will have a painful punishment
on the Day when God will resurrect them all, and tells them what they did. God has kept accounts of it all, while they have forgotten it; God is Witness over all things

Do not you realize that God knows everything in the heavens and on earth? There is no secret conversation between three people, but He is their fourth; nor between five, but He is their sixth; nor between less than that, nor more, but He is with them wherever they are. Then, on the Day of Resurrection, He will inform them of what they did. God is All-knowing of everything

Have you not noticed that those who were prohibited from conspiring secretly, have returned to what they were prohibited from doing? They conspire to commit wrongdoing, aggression, and defiance of the Messenger. And when they come to you, they greet you with a greeting that God never greeted you with. And they say to themselves, "Why does not God punish us for what we say?" Hell will be enough for them. They will burn there. What a miserable destiny

Believers, when you converse privately, do not converse about committing wrongdoing, aggression and defiance of the Messenger, but converse about righteousness and being mindful of God. Be ever mindful of God, to whom you will be gathered
Conversing in secret to conspire is from Satan, to dishearten the believers, though it will not harm them at all, unless God permits it. So let the believers put their trust in God

Believers, when you are told to make room in your gathering, then do so; God will make room for you. And when you are told, "Get up," then get up; God will elevate in rank those who believed among you and those who were given knowledge. God is well aware of what you do

Believers, when you privately converse with the Messenger, proceed by offering something in charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you do not find the means to do so, then God is Ever-Forgiving and Merciful-to-all

Do you regret not offering charity before your conversation with the Prophet? If you did not give, and God pardoned you, then perform prayers, and give charitable gifts, and obey God and His Messenger. God is well Aware of what you do
Don't you see those who befriend a people with whom God is angry? They are neither with you nor with them, and knowingly swear to lies
God has prepared a severe punishment for them. What they were doing is evil
They took their oaths as a cover-up, and turned others away from the way of God. They will have a humiliating punishment
Neither their wealth nor their children will be of any use to them against God. They will be the inhabitants of the Fire, where they will remain
On the Day when God will resurrect them altogether, they will swear to Him as they swear to you, thinking that this will help them. What liars they are
Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of God. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan will be the doomed
Those who oppose God and His Messenger are among the most humiliated
God has written, "I will surely prevail, I and My Messengers." God is All- Powerful, Almighty

You will not find a people who believe in God and the Last Day, loyal to those who oppose God and His Messenger, even if they were their parents or their children, or their brothers or their close relatives. God has written faith into the hearts of these people, and has strengthened them with His spirit. He will admit them to Gardens graced with flowing streams, where they will dwell forever. God is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. These are of the party of God. Unquestionably, the party of God will be the successful
All that exists in the heavens and the earth is praising God's limitless glory. He is the Almighty, the Most Wise

It is He who evicted those who broke faith among the people of the Book from their homes at the first mobilization. You did not think they would leave, and they thought their fortresses would protect them from God. But God came at them from where they least expected it, and He put panic into their hearts. They wrecked their homes with their own hands, and by the hands of the believers. Therefore, take a lesson, all of you with insight
Had God not decreed evacuation for them, He would have punished them in this world, and in the Hereafter they will have the punishment of the Fire
That is because they opposed God and His Messenger. God is severe in punishment toward anyone opposing God
Whatever you have cut down of their palm trees or left standing on its roots, it is by permission of God. So that He might disgrace the defiantly disobedient

Whatever God has given to His Messenger from them; you did not have to spur your horses or camels for them, but God gives authority to His Messengers over whomever He will. God is able to do all things

Whatever gains God has restored to His Messenger from the villages' inhabitants belongs to God, the Messenger, the relatives, the orphans, the needy, and to the wayfarer; so that it may not circulate mainly between the wealthy among you. So accept whatever the Messenger gives you, and abstain from whatever he forbids you. And be mindful of God. God is severe in punishment
It is also for the poor emigrants who were driven out of their homes and their possessions, who seek God's blessings and His approval, and support God and His Messenger. Those are the truly sincere

And (also for] those who before them, were already established in their homes [in Medina], and have accepted faith. They love those who migrated to them, and find no hesitation in their hearts in helping them. They give them preference over themselves, even if they themselves are needy. Whoever is spared from his own soul's greed is truly successful

Those who came after them, say, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith, and leave no malice in our hearts toward those who believe. Our Lord, You are Most Compassionate, Merciful-to-all

Have you noticed those who act hypocritically? They say to their brothers, the faithless among the people of the Book, "If you are driven out, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey anyone who wants to harm you; and should anyone fight you, we will certainly support you." But God bears witness that they are truly liars

If they are driven out, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not support them. Even if they should support them, they will surely turn their backs and flee; then they will not be helped
Indeed, you [believers] strike more terror in their hearts than their fear of God. That is because they are a people who do not understand

Even united they will not fight you except within fortified strongholds, or from behind walls. There is much hostility between them. You think they are united, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people without reason
Like those who went shortly before them. They experience the evil consequences of their decisions. A painful punishment awaits them
They are like Satan who says to a human being, "Do not believe." But when he denies the truth, he says, "I disown you; I fear God, the Lord of the worlds
The ultimate end of both is the Fire, where they will dwell forever. That is the reward of the unjust
Believers, be mindful of God. And let every soul consider what it has put forth for tomorrow, and be mindful of God, for God is well aware of what you do
And do not be like those who forgot God, so He made them forget themselves. These are the defiantly disobedient
The inhabitants of the Fire and the inhabitants of Paradise are not equal. It is the inhabitants of Paradise who are the winners
Had We sent down this Qur'an on a mountain, you would have seen it humbling itself and crumbling in awe of God. These examples We mention for the people, that they may reflect
He is God, there is no god but Him, the Knower of all that is beyond our senses and all that we can witness. He is the Mercy giver, the Merciful-to-all

He is God, there is no god but Him, the Sovereign, the Holy, the Peace Giver, the Faith Giver, the Overseer, the Almighty, the Powerful, the Supremely Great. May God be exalted in His glory, above all they associate with Him
He is God, the Creator, the Maker, the Fashioner; to Him belongs the Most Beautiful Names. Whatever is in the heavens and earth glorifies Him. He is the Almighty, the Wise

Believers do not take My enemies and yours as allies, offering them affection, when they have rejected the Truth that has come to you. They have driven you and the Messenger out, because you believe in God, your Lord. If you have decided to struggle in My way, seeking My approval, how can you secretly love them? I know what you concealed and what you reveal. Whoever among you does that is straying from the right path
If they ever gain dominance over you, they will treat you as enemies, and they will stretch out their hands and tongues to hurt you. They would dearly wish that you renounce your faith
Never will your blood lines or your children be of any use to you. God will separate you on the Day of Resurrection. God is All-Seeing of what you do

There has already been a good example for you in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, "we disown you and what you worship besides God. We reject you, and there will be animosity and hatred forever between us and you until you believe in God alone." Except for Abraham's words to his father, "I will ask forgiveness for you, though I cannot protect you from God". "Our Lord, in You we trust, and to You we repent. To You is the ultimate destination
Our Lord, do not make us a target for the unbelievers, and forgive us. Our Lord, You are the Almighty, the Wise
There is a good example in them for you, for anyone who seeks God and the Last Day. But if anyone turns away, God is the Rich Beyond Need, the Praiseworthy
Perhaps God will restore affection between you and your present enemies. God is able to do all things. God is Ever Forgiving and Merciful-to-all
God does not forbid you from dealing kindly and equitably with those who did not fight you because of your faith and did not drive you out of your homes. God loves those who are equitable
But God forbids you from befriending those who fought against you over your faith and drove you from your homes and helped others to drive you out. Any who takes them for friends are the wrongdoers

Believers, when believing women come to you as emigrants, test them. God knows best about their faith. And if you find them to be faithful, then do not return them to the unbelievers. They are not lawful wives for them, nor are they their lawful husbands. But give the unbelievers what they have spent. You are not to blame if you marry them later provided you give them their dues. And do not hold to marriage bonds with unbelieving women, but ask for what you have spent and let them ask for what they have spent. This is God's judgment; He judges between you. God is All-knowing and All-Wise

If any of your wives rejoin the unbelievers, and you decide to penalize them, then give those whose wives have gone the equivalent of what they had spent [out of what you owe the unbelievers]. And be mindful of God, in whom you are believers

Prophet, when believing women come to you, pledging that they will not associate anything with God, nor steal, nor commit adultery, nor will they kill their children, nor lie about who has fathered their children, nor disobey you in what is right, then accept their pledge of allegiance and ask God's forgiveness for them. God is Forgiving and Merciful-to-all
Believers do not take as allies those with whom God is angry. They have despaired of the Hereafter, as unbelievers despair of those buried in their graves
Everything in the heavens and the earth declare the praises of God's limitless glory. He is the Almighty, the Wise
Believers, why do you say what you do not do
it is most despicable in God's sight that you say what you do not do
God loves those who fight in solid lines for His cause, as though they were a well-built structure

And mention when Moses said to his people, "My people, why do you hurt me when you know that I am God's Messenger to you?" And when they turned away, God caused their hearts to turn away. God does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

And when Jesus son of Mary said, "O children of Israel, I am God's Messenger to you, confirming what is available of the Torah, and bringing good news of a messenger who will come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidence, they said, "This is obvious magic
And who is more unjust than one who invents lies and attributes them to God when invited to submit? God does not guide unjust people
They wish to extinguish God's enlightenment with their mouths, but God will perfect His light, even though the unbelievers dislike it
It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of Truth, that he may proclaim it over all religions, even though those who associate others with God will dislike it
Believers, will I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment
That you believe in God and His Messenger, and strive in the cause of God with your wealth and yourselves. That is best for you, if you only knew
He will forgive you your sins; and will admit you to Gardens with rivers flowing through them and pleasant dwellings in the Gardens of Eden. That is the great success
And another thing you love: support from God and imminent victory; Give good news to the believers

Believers, be supporters of God, as Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters to God?" The disciples said, "We are God's supporters." A faction of the Children of Israel believed, and another faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant
Everything in the heavens and the earth declare the praises of God's limitless glory, the Sovereign, the Holy, the Almighty, the Wise
It is He who raised a messenger from among the Gentiles; reciting His revelations to them, purifying them, and teaching them the Book and Wisdom; although before that they were clearly misguided
and [he is sent] to others of them who have not yet joined them. God is the Almighty, the Wise
Such is God's favor, which He gives to whom He wills; God is the possessor of great favors

The example of those who were entrusted to uphold the Torah, but then failed to uphold it, is that of a donkey carrying volumes of knowledge. Terrible is the example of the people who reject the signs of God. God does not guide the unjust People
Say, " you who follow Judaism, if you claim that out of all people you alone are friends of God, then wish for death if you are truthful
But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have done. God knows the unjust well
Say, "The death from which you are fleeing will catch up with you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unknown and the known, and He will inform you about what you used to do
Believers, when the call is made for prayer on Friday, drop all business and rush to the remembrance of God. That is better for you, if you only knew
Then when the prayer is concluded, disperse through the land, and seek God's favor, and remember to call on God without ceasing, so that you may prosper

Yet whenever they come across some business, or some entertainment, they scramble towards it, and leave you standing there. Say, "That which is with God is better than entertainment and business; God is the Best of providers

When the hypocrites come to you, they say, "We bear witness that you are indeed God's Messenger." God knows that you are indeed His Messenger and God bears witness that the hypocrites are indeed liars
They have taken their oaths as a cover, to divert people from the way of God. Evil is what they do
That is because they believed, and then rejected the truth; so their hearts have been sealed, and they cannot understand

When you see them, their appearance appeals to you. And when they speak, you listen to what they say. They are like propped up timber. They think every shout is aimed at them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May God destroy them; how devious they are
And when It is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of God will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside in contempt and you see them turning away arrogantly
It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them; God will not forgive them. God does not guide such defiantly disobedient people

It is they who say, "Give nothing to those who follow God's Messenger, until they dispersed from around him." To God belongs the treasuries of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand
They say, "If we return to Medina, the more worthy will drive out the disgraced." But all worth belongs to God, His Messenger, and the believers; though the hypocrites do not know it
Believers, let neither your wealth nor your children distract you from remembering to call upon God. Whoever does that are the doomed

Give from what We have provided for you, before death comes to one of you, and he says, "My Lord, if You would only delay me for a little while, so that I may be charitable, and be among the righteous
But God will never delay a soul when its time has come. God is well aware of what you do
Everything in the heavens and the earth declare the praises of God's limitless glory. To Him belongs the Kingdom, and to Him all praise is due. He is able to do all things
It is He who created you. Yet some of you deny the truth, and some believe it. God sees everything you do
He created the heavens and earth in Truth, and shaped you and perfected your shapes; and to Him is the ultimate destination
He knows everything in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you reveal. God knows very well the secrets of every heart
Has the news not reached you, of those who rejected the truth before you? They tasted the ill consequences of their conduct, and they will have a painful punishment

That is because their messengers came to them with clear evidence, but they said, "Are human beings going to guide us?" So they denied their messengers and turned away. God had no need for them; God is reach beyond need and praiseworthy
The unbelievers claim that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes indeed, by my Lord, you will be resurrected; then you will be informed of everything you did; that is easy for God
So believe in God and His Messenger and the enlightenment We have sent down. God is well aware of what you do

When He gathers you for the Day of Gathering, the Day of mutual neglect, whoever believes in God and does good deeds, He will forgive him his misdeeds and admit him to Gardens with rivers flowing through them, where they will remain forever. That is the great success
But for those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations, these are the companions of the Fire, remaining there forever; and what a miserable destination
No disaster occurs except by permission of God. Whoever believes in God, He will guide his heart. God has full knowledge of everything
Obey God and obey the Messenger. But if you turn away, it is only incumbent on Our messenger to deliver the clear message
God, there is no god but Him. So let the believers put their trust in Him
Believers, there are enemies to you among your wives and your children, so beware of them. But if you pardon, overlook, and forgive, God is forgiving and Merciful-to-all
Your possessions and your children are a test for you, but with God there is a great reward
So be mindful of God as much as you can; hear and obey and be charitable, it is for your own good. He who is safe-guarded from his own greed, those are the successful ones
If you loan God a loan of goodness, He will multiply it for you, and forgive you. God is appreciative and forbearing
He's the Knower of all that is beyond our senses and all that we can witness, the Almighty, the Wise

Prophet, when any of you intend to divorce wives, do so at the beginning of their prescribed waiting period. Calculate the period's term carefully and be mindful of God, your Lord. Do not drive them out of their homes, nor should they leave during that period, unless they have committed a proven adultery. These are the limits of God and whoever oversteps God's limits wrongs his own soul. You never know what new situation God may bring about

When they have fulfilled their term, either retain them honorably, or part with them honorably. And call from among your just witnesses, to give testimony for God's sake. Anyone who believes in God and the Last Day should heed this. God will find a way out for whoever is mindful of Him
and will provide for him from an unexpected source. God will suffice for those who put their trust in Him. God will achieve His purpose. God has set a due measure for everything

If you have any doubts, regarding a wife who has ceased menstruating and for one who have not yet menstruated, the period of waiting shall be three months. And for those who are pregnant, their term shall be until they have delivered. God makes things easy for those who are mindful of Him
This is God's command which He sent down to you. God will forgive the misdeeds and increase the rewards of anyone who is mindful of Him

Allow the wives you are divorcing to reside where you reside, according to your means. Do not harass them in order to make things difficult for them. If they are pregnant, maintain them until they give birth. And if they nurse your infant, compensate them fairly. Maintain your relationship in a friendly and honorable way. But if you disagree, then let another woman nurse him

Let the wealthy spend according to his wealth, and he whose resources are restricted shall spend according to what God has given him. God does not burden a soul beyond what He has given it. After hardship, God will bring ease
Many a town defied the command of its Lord and His Messengers, so We held them strictly accountable, and We punished them with a horrifying punishment
to experience the consequences of its decisions, and the outcome of its decisions was total loss
God has prepared a severe punishment for them.So you who are endowed with insight and have faith, be conscious of God. He has sent down a Reminder to you

a Messenger who recites God's verses that make things clear to you, that he may bring those who believe and do good deeds from the darkness of ignorance into enlightenment. God will admit those who believe in Him and do good deeds into Gardens with rivers flowing through them, to dwell there forever and ever. God has provided excellently for them

It is God who created seven heavens, and a similar number of earths. His command descends through them, so that you may know that God is able to do all things, and that God's knowledge has encompassed all things
Prophet, why do you prohibit what God has made lawful to you, seeking to please your wives? God is forgiving and Merciful-to-all
God has already ordained for you [believers) to release you from such oaths. God is your protector and He is the All-knowing, the All-Wise

The Prophet told something in confidence to one of his wives. But when she disclosed it [to another wife], God made it known to him; he confirmed part of it, and ignored another part. Then when he confronted her with it, she asked, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the All-knowing, the All-Aware

You two [wives] need to repent to God, for your hearts have clearly deviated. But if you band together against him, then God is his protector, as is Gabriel and the righteous believers. In addition, the angels will come to his support
Perhaps if he divorced you, his Lord will give him wives better than you: submissive to God, believing, obedient, repentant, worshipping, who fast much; previously married as well as virgins

Believers, safeguard yourselves and your families from a Fire fueled by people and stones. fierce and powerful angels stand over it. They never disobey God's commands to them, but do as they are commanded
Unbelievers make no excuses today. You are only being repaid for what you used to do

Believers, turn to God in sincere repentance. Your Lord may remove your sins, and admit you into Gardens with rivers flowing through them, on the Day when God will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them, and to their right, they will say, "Our Lord, perfect our light for us and forgive us. You are able to do all things
Prophet, strive against the unbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh with them. Hell will be their dwelling. What a miserable destination

God has given an example to those who reject the truth: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were married to two of Our righteous worshipers but they betrayed them. They were not able to help them at all with God, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who are entering

And God has given an example to those who believed: Pharaoh's wife, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You, a house in Paradise, and rescue me from Pharaoh and his works and save me from the unjust people
And the example of Mary, Imran's daughter, who guarded her chastity. So We breathed into her from Our Spirit; and she believed in her Lord's Words and His Books, and was one of the devoutly obedient
Exalted is He who has all Sovereignty in His Hand, who has power over all things
He who created death and life to test you as to which of you is best in deed. He is the Almighty, the Forgiving
it is He who created seven heavens in total harmony with one another. You will not see any discrepancy in the creation of the Merciful-to-all. Look again, do you see any gaps
Then look again, and again, and your sight will return to you dazzled and exhausted
We have beautified the lowest heaven with lit objects and use them as tools to stone devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blazing fire
For those who reject their Lord, there is the punishment of Hell, a miserable destination
When they are thrown into it, they will hear it roaring, as it seethes
It almost bursts with rage. Every time a group is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did no one come to warn you
They will say, "Yes, someone came to warn us, but we did not believe in him and said, 'God has not sent down anything. You are in greatly misguided
They will say, "Had we listened or reasoned, we would not have been included among the inhabitants of the Blazing fire
So they will come to realize and admit their sin. Away with the inhabitants of the Blazing fire
Forgiveness and great reward await those who stand in awe of their Lord although He is beyond the reach of their perception
Whether you keep your thoughts to yourself, or state them openly, He knows what is within the heart
Would He who created not know, when He is the Most Subtle, the Totally Aware
It is He who tamed the earth for you, so travel its regions, and eat of His provision. To Him you will be resurrected
Do you feel confident that He who is in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you as it spins
Or are you confident that He who is in heaven would not unleash a violent storm of stones against you?Then you will know how true My warning was
Those before them had already denied my warnings, and how terrible was My condemnation
Have they not seen the birds above them, with wings outspread or folded in? None holds them except the Merciful-to-all. He is, The Ever Insightful
Or who can be a force to protect you other than the Merciful-to-all? The unbelievers are really living in delusion
Or who can provide for you if He withholds His provision? Yet they persist in their disrespect and evasion
Is he who walks, stumbles and falls on his face better guided or he who walks upright on a straight path
Say, "It is He who brought you into being; and gave you hearing and vision and understanding. But you are rarely grateful
Say, "It is He who scattered you on earth, and to Him you will be gathered
And they say, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if what you say is true
Say, "God alone has knowledge of this, and I am only delivering a clear warning
But when they see it approaching, the unbelievers' faces will turn gloomy, and it will be said, "This is what you were calling for
Say, "Just think: Should God destroy me and those with me, or if He decides to have mercy on us, who will protect the unbelievers from a painful punishment
Say, "He is the Merciful-to-all; We have believed in Him, and in Him We trust. You will come to know who is in evident error
Say, "Just think: if your water drains away, who will bring you pure flowing water
Nun. By the pen and all they write
you are not, by the grace of your Lord, a madman
And you will have a never ending reward
And you are a man of great moral character
You will see and they will see
which of you is afflicted by madness
Your Lord knows best who has strayed from His path, and He knows best who is guided
Then do not obey the unbelievers
They wish that you compromise, so they too can compromise
And do not obey any worthless contemptible swearer
or any backbiter and slander-monger
preventer of good, aggressor and one who is sinner
cruel, moreover, and furthermore one who is despicable
Just because he has money and children
when Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Myth of former people
We will brand him on the snout
We have tested them, as We tested the owners of a certain garden, when they vowed to harvest it in the morning
and made no allowance [for the Will of God]
But a disaster from your Lord came upon it while they slept
By morning it became barren and bleak
At day break they called to one another
saying, "Go early to your crop if you want to harvest the fruit
So they set out, whispering
Make sure no poor person enters the garden today
And early they went bent on their purpose
But when they saw it, they said, " We are lost
Rather, we have been ruined
The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, that you should praise your Lord's glory
They said, "May our Lord be exalted in His glory, we were unjust
Then they turned to one another, each blaming the other
They said, "How terrible for us; we were aggressors
Perhaps our Lord will give us a better substitute for it. We are turning to our Lord in hope
Such is the punishment. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew
There will be Gardens of delight for those who are mindful of God
Would We treat those who submit to us like those who forced others to reject Our messages
What is the matter with you? How do you judge
Or do you have a Book which you study
And in it do you find all that you wish for
Or do you have oaths from Us, that are binding until the Day of Resurrection, allowing you to have whatever you want
Ask them which of them, will be responsible for that claim
Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they are telling the truth
On the Day when legs are bared, they will be called to bow down, but will not be able
Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. They were invited to bow down while they were healthy
So leave those who deny this revelation to Me. We will proceed against them gradually, from whence they do not know
And I will give them time. My plan is firm
Or do you ask them for a wage, so they are burdened with debt
Or do they know the future, and they write what is going to happen
So be patient for your Lord's judgment, and do not be like the fellow of the whale who called out in despair
Had a blessing from his Lord not reached him, he would have been abandoned and disgraced on a naked shore
But his Lord chose him and made him among the righteous
Those unbelievers all but kill you with their evil looks when they hear the message, and they say, "He must be mad
But it is only a reminder to all people
The Hour of Truth
What is the Hour of Truth
And how would you know what is the Hour of Truth
The people of Thamud and 'Aad denied [that there would be a] sudden calamity
So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering blast
And as for Aad, they were destroyed by a furious, roaring wind
which He unleashed against them for seven nights and eight days, nonstop. You could have seen its people lying dead as if they were hollow palm tree trunks
Do you see anything left of them
Then came Pharaoh and those before him, and the destroyed towns that indulged in sin
They disobeyed their Lord's Messenger, so He seized them with an overpowering grip
When the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship
To make it a lesson for you to remember, so listening ears may recall it
Then when the Horn is blown with a single blast
and the earth and the mountains are lifted up and crushed with one blow
on that Day, the Hour of Truth will occur
The heaven will split open on that Day, since it will be so frail
And the angels will be round its edges. On that Day, eight of them will bear your Lord's Throne of His majesty above them
On that Day you will be exposed, and no secret of yours will remain hidden
As for him who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, take my record and read it
I expected that I would be held accountable
So, he will have a pleasant life
in an elevated Garden
its pickings are within easy reach
Eat and drink merrily for what you have done in days gone by
As for him who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "I wish I was never given my record
and never knew what my account was
If only death had really been the end
My wealth has been of no use to me
and my power has vanished
[God will say], "Seize him and shackle him
Then drive him into Hell
Then tie him with a chain whose length is seventy cubits
For he would not believe in God, the Magnificent
nor would he encourage feeding of the poor
So he has no friend here this Day
nor any food except scum
that only sinners eat
So I swear by what you see
and what you do not see
that this is the word of a noble Messenger
And It is not the word of a poet; how little you believe
nor the word of a soothsayer; how little you remember
The gradual revelations of the Book, is from the Lord of the worlds
Had he [the Messenger] falsely attributed some statements to Us
We would have seized him by the right arm
Then We would have slashed his lifeline
and none of you could have protected him
It [The Qur'an] is a reminder for the those who are mindful of God
And We know that some of you will deny it
It is a cause of great distress to the unbelievers
And it is the Truth of certainty
Exalt, then, the limitless glory of your Lord's magnificent name
An inquirer asked about an impending punishment
to the unbelievers that cannot be prevented
from God, the Lord of the Gates of Ascent
Unto Him the angels and the Spirit will ascend in a Day whose length is fifty thousand years
So be patient with gracious patience
They [the unbelievers] see it as something distant
but We see it near
On the Day the sky will be like molten brass
and the mountains will be like tufted wool
No good friend will ask about his friend
even though they can see each other. The one who forced others to reject Our messages will wish he could ransom himself from the punishment of that Day, by sacrificing his children
and his wife and his brother
and his family who shelter him
and everyone on earth, if that could save him
Not today! But a raging blaze
that strips away the skin
and claims everyone who turned his back to the truth and went away
and accumulated and hoarded [wealth]
The Human being was created full of anxiety
desperate when bad things happen
but tight-fisted when good fortune comes his way
The exception are those who pray
those who are steady in their prayer
and those who have set aside a known rightful share within their wealth
for the poor and the deprived
and those who believe in the Day of Judgment
and those who dread their Lord's punishment
They know not to take their Lord's punishment for granted
Those who guard their chastity
except from their spouses and from those whom their right hands hold in trust, are free of blame
But whoever seeks beyond that, they are transgressors
Those who honor their trusts and pledges
and those who stand by their testimonies
and those who maintain their prayer with dedication
those will be honored in Gardens
So what is [the matter] with the unbelievers? They run about in front of you in groups, with outstretched necks and staring eyes
from the right, and from the left
Does each one of them aspire to enter the Garden of Delight
Never! We have created them from that which they well know
So I swear by the Lord of all risings and settings that We are able
to replace them with better than they; and nothing can prevent Us from doing this
So leave them to blunder and play around, until they meet their Day which they are promised
The Day when they will emerge from the graves rushing as if rallying to a flag
their eyes humbled, overwhelmed by humiliation. This is the Day which they were promised
We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them
He said, "My people, I am coming to you with clear warnings
Worship God, be mindful of Him and obey me
God will forgive you of your sins, and reprieve you until an appointed time. When God's appointed time arrives it cannot be postponed, if you only knew
He said, "My Lord, I invited my people night and day
but the more I called them, the further they ran away
Every time I called them to Your forgiveness, they put their fingers into their ears, wrapped themselves in their garments, and insisted, and became increasingly more arrogant
I invited them openly
Then I appealed to them publicly, and I spoke to them privately
and said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. He is ever forgiving
He will send down abundant rain from the sky for you
and will provide you with wealth and children and He will give you gardens and rivers
What is the matter with you? Why can't you appreciate God's majesty
when He has created you stage by stage
Do you not see how God created seven superimposed heavens
and placed the moon in them as a enlightenment and He made the sun a source of light
God germinated you from the earth like plants
Then He will return you into it, and will bring you out again
And God has spread the earth out for you
that you may travel its valleys as roadways
Noah said, "My Lord, they have defied me, and followed those whose wealth and children lead them increasingly into loss
And they schemed outrageously
And said, 'Do not abandon your gods. Never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr
They have already misled many. My Lord, increase these transgressors only in misguidance
Because of their sins they were drowned and sent to Hell. They could not find any one to help them against God
And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever on the face of the earth
If You leave them, they will mislead Your worshipers and breed only wicked unbelievers
My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house as a believer. Forgive all the believing men and women, but bring nothing but ruin down on the transgressors
Say, "It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened in and said, 'We have heard an amazing Recitation
It guides to righteousness, and we have believed it: We will never assign divinity to anyone except our Lord
And exalted be the glory of our Lord! He never had a spouse nor a child
But the fools among us had been saying outrageous things about God
although we had thought that no human or jinn would dare tell a lie about God
Some individual humans used to seek power through some individual jinn, but they [the jinn] only increased their confusion
And they thought, as you thought, that God would not send anyone [as a messenger]
We as usual probed heaven [in search of news], and found it filled with fierce guards and projectiles
We used to take up certain positions to listen in; but anyone trying to listen now finds a projectile in wait for him
We do not know therefore whether ill is intended for those on earth, or whether their Lord intends to guide them
Some of us are righteous, but others are less so; we follow different paths
And we have come to realize that we can never evade God living on earth, nor can we evade Him by escaping [from life]
So when we heard this call to guidance, we believed in it. Whoever believes in his Lord will no longer fear the burden of life or injustice
Some of us submitted to God, while others are transgressors. Those who submitted have sought out right guidance
As for the transgressors, they will be firewood for Hell
Had [your people] kept true to the path, We would have given them abundant drinking water supply
a test for them. Whoever turns away from remembering to call on his Lord will be put into an arduous punishment
Places of worship are for God. So do not call on anyone else besides God
Yet when God's servant stood up calling on Him, they [the unbelievers] overwhelmed him with their crowds
Say, "I only call on my Lord and I never associate anyone with Him
Say, "It is not in my power to harm you, nor to guide you rightly
Say, "No one can protect me from God, and I will never find any refuge except in Him
I only deliver what I receive from God and His messages.He who disobeys God and His Messenger, will have the fire of Hell where they will be forever
until they see that which they were promised and they will know who has less support and are fewer in number
Say, "I do not know whether what you are promised will happen soon or whether it will be delayed by my Lord for a period
He alone knows what is beyond our perception, and He doesn't disclose His knowledge of the unseen to anyone
except to a Messenger of His choosing. He then dispatches guards before him and behind him
That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord. He encompasses what they have, and has counted everything by number
You who wraps himself [in his clothing]
stay up during the night, except for a little
for half of it, or a little less
or a little more, and recite the Qur'an slowly and distinctly
We will send a weighty message to you
Rising at night has a stronger effect and is more conducive to concentration
In the daytime, you are kept busy for long periods
So remember to call upon the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly
The Lord of the East and the West; there is no god but Him. So, assign to Him alone the power to determine your fate
And patiently endure what they say, and withdraw from them politely
and leave those who deny the truth and live in luxury to Me. Just bear with them a little longer
We have shackles and Hell
And food that chokes and a painful punishment reserved for them
on the Day when the earth and the mountains tremble, and the mountains become heaps of sand
We have sent to you a messenger, a witness over you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger
But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a crushing grip
How, then, if you refuse to acknowledge the truth, will you protect yourself from a Day which will turn the children gray-haired
A Day when the heavens will shatter. God's promise is always fulfilled
This is a reminder, so let anyone who wills set a path towards his Lord

Your Lord knows that you stay up praying nearly two-thirds of the night, or half of it, or one-third of it, along with a group of those with you. God justly evaluates the night and the day. He knows that you will not be able to sustain it, so He will not require it of you. Read from the Qur'an what you can. He knows that some of you may be ill; and others travelling through the land, seeking God's bounty; yet others will be fighting in God's cause. So read from it what is easy for you, and observe the prayers, and pay The purifying alms, and lend God a loan of goodness. Whatever good you advance for yourselves, you will find it with God, improved and increased for you. Ask God's forgiveness, for God is Forgiving and Merciful
You, wrapped in your shroud
arise and give warning
glorify your Lord' greatness
purify your clothing and
avoid all filth
Do not give out of a desire for gain
But be steadfast for your Lord's cause
When the Trumpet is blown
that Day will be a difficult day
not easy for the unbelievers
Leave Me alone with the one I created
to whom I gave great wealth
sons around him
and for whom I smoothed all things
Then he desires that I should add more
No! He was stubbornly hostile to Our revelation
I will increasingly exhaust him
He reflected and plotted
So, may he perish how he plotted
Then may he perish how he plotted
Then he looked
then he frowned and glared
Then he turned back to his old arrogance
and said, "This is nothing but magic handed down from the past
This is not but the word of a human being
I will roast him into Saqar
And how would you know what is Saqar
It neither leaves, nor spares
scorching the flesh
There are nineteen in charge of it

We have appointed only angels to be wardens of the Fire, and caused their number to be a stumbling block for those who disbelieve; so that those given the Book may attain certainty; and those who believe may increase in faith; and those given the Book and the believers may not doubt; and those in whose hearts is sickness and the unbelievers may say, "What did God ever mean by this example?" In this way God lets go astray the one who wishes to go astray, and guides him who wishes to be guided. None knows your Lord's forces but Him. This is nothing but a reminder to all human beings
No! By the moon
and the night when it departs
and the morning as it brightens
it is one of those great things
as a warning to human beings
to whomever among you wishes to advance or regress
Every soul, is held in pledge for its own deeds
Except for those on the right
in Gardens, inquiring
about those who forced others to reject Our messages
What caused you to be in Saqar
They will say, "We were not among those who prayed
nor did we feed the poor
And we used to indulge in vain discussions with those who indulged [in mocking the believers]
And we used to deny the Day of Judgment
until the Certain End came upon us
