The intercession of intercessors will not help them
Why then are they turning away from this reminder
as if they were panicked donkeys
fleeing from a lion
Yet, every one of them wishes to be given scriptures unrolled before their very eyes
No! But they do not fear the Hereafter
No! This is but a reminder
and whoever wills may take it to heart
But they will not remember, unless God so wills. He is the Source of all righteousness, and the source of all forgiveness
I swear by the Day of Resurrection
And I swear by the self-reproaching soul
Does the human being think that We will not reassemble his bones
Yes indeed. We are able even to reshape his fingertips
Yet the human being wants to deny what lies ahead of him
He asks, "When is this Day of Resurrection
When vision is dazzled
the moon is eclipsed
and the sun and the moon are joined together
on that Day, man will say, "Where is the escape
No indeed! There is no refuge
Your Lord is the final destination on that Day
On that Day the Human being will be informed of all deeds he put forward for this day and everything that should have been left behind
Rather, the human being, will give evidence against himself
in spite of any excuses he presents
[Prophet], do not move your tongue attempting to rush your memorization of the Revelation
Its collection and recitation are up to us
So, when We recite it, follow its recitation
it is then, up to Us, to make it all clear
But you love this brief life
and disregard the Hereafter
There are faces on that Day that will be bright
looking toward their Lord
While other faces on that Day, will be gloomy with despair
realizing that a backbreaking blow has befallen them
But when the last breath has reached the throat
and It is said, "Who will heal him now
And he realizes that it is parting time
when one leg is entwined with the other
that Day the journey is to your Lord
He neither believed, nor prayed
but he denied and turned away
Then he went to his people, full of himself and false pride
Your demise is getting closer to you and closer
yet closer and closer still
Does the human being think that he [was created] to be forgotten
Was he not the sperm of ejaculated semen that fertilized the ovum
Then he became a clot. And [God] created and proportioned
and made of him the two sexes, the male and the female
Is not that [Creator] able to bring the dead to life
Has there come upon the human being a span of time when he was nothing to be mentioned
We created the human being from a fertilized ovum to test him; and We gave him hearing and sight
Then We guided him to the right path, whether he is grateful or not
We have prepared chains, shackles and a Searing Fire for the unbelievers
But the righteous will drink from a cup whose mixture is Kafour
a spring from which God's worshipers shall drink, making it gush abundantly at will
They are the ones who fulfill their vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread
They feed the needy, the orphan, and the prisoner, for the love of Him
[Saying], "We feed you for the sake of God. We want neither compensation, nor gratitude from you
We simply dread an austere and stressful Day promised by our Lord
So God will spare them the evil of that Day and will give them radiance and joy
and will reward them for what they patiently endured with a Garden and silk
reclining there on couches. They will not experience there either burning sun or bitter cold
Shades cover them, and its fruit hanging close ready to be picked
Circulated among them are vessels of silver, and cups of pure crystal
clear glasses made from silver according to their own measure
They will be given a drink mixed with ginger
from a spring there named Salsabeel
Passing among them are immortal youths. If you see them, you would think they were like sprinkled pearls
If you were to look around, you would see a heavenly and vast kingdom
They will wear green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with silver bracelets. Their Lord will give them a purified drink
This is a reward for you. Your efforts are well appreciated
It is We who have sent down the Qur'an to you in gradual revelations
So await your Lord's Judgment with patience; and do not obey a sinner or a denier of the truth from among them
Remember to call on the name of your Lord morning and evening
And during the night bow down to Him and exalt His limitless glory long into the night
These people love the present life, and leave behind a Heavy Day
We have created them, and strengthened their frame; and if we wish, We can replace them with others like them
This is a reminder. Let whoever wills, take a path to his Lord
Yet you cannot will, unless God wills. God is Knowing and Wise
He admits whom He wills into His mercy. But He has prepared a painful punishment for the unjust
By those [winds] sent forth in gusts
and those violently storming
consider these [messages] that spread [the Truth] far and wide
thus separating [right and wrong] with all clarity
and then delivering a reminder
[promising] freedom from blame or [offering] a warning
what you are promised will surely happen
So when the stars are extinguished
the heaven is split open
the mountains are blown away
And when the messengers are called together to an appointed time
for what Day was it postponed
For the Day of Decision
And what do you know about the Day of Decision
How horrible is that Day for those who deny the truth
Did We not destroy the earlier people
And We shall make the latter follow them
This is how We deal with those who forced others to reject Our messages
How horrible is that Day for those who reject the truth
Did We not create you from an insignificant liquid
Then lodged it in a secure place
for a known term
And We determined it, how excellently We determine
How terrible is that Day for the deniers of the truth
Have We not made the earth a home
for the living and the dead
And We placed firmly embedded mountains in it, rising high, and given you sweet water to drink
How terrible is that Day for the deniers of the truth
Proceed to what you used to deny
Proceed to a shadow with three columns
that has no shade and will not prevent you from the flame
It shoots sparks [as huge] as a fortress
like giant fiery ropes
How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth
On that Day they will be speechless
and they not be given permission to offer any excuses
How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth
This is the Day of Decision; We will have gathered you together with the earlier people
So if you have a ploy, then use it against my plan now
How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth
The God-conscious will be amidst shades and springs
and any fruits they desire
Eat and drink and enjoy it as a reward for your deeds
This is how We reward those who do good
How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth
You are but dissenters. So eat and enjoy yourselves a little [while you can]
How terrible is that Day for the deniers of the truth
And when It is said to them, "Bow down [in prayer]," they do not bow
How terrible is that Day for those who denied the truth
In what message beyond this will they believe
What are they wondering about
About the huge announcement
over which they are in disagreement
They will know
For sure they will know
Have We not made the earth a cradle
And the mountains as pegs
And We created you in pairs
And made your sleep to rest
And made the night a cover
And made the day for livelihood
And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
And made [the sun] a glowing lamp
And sent down from the clouds pouring water
to produce with it grain, vegetation
and luxuriant gardens
The Day of Decision has been appointed
The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in droves
And the heavens are opened and becomes gateways
And the mountains are set in motion and will become a mirage
Hell has been lying in wait
to be a home for the oppressors
to stay in for a long, long time
They will not taste any coolness there or drink
except for boiling water and sizzling pus
An appropriate reward
They were not expecting to be held accountable
And utterly rejected Our verses
We have recorded everything in writing
So feel it, We will only increase your punishment
For those who were mindful of God there is a great achievement
gardens and grapevines
splendid, well matched spouses
and a full cup
There, they will hear no gossip or lies
A reward from your Lord, a fitting gift
The Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything between them, the Merciful-to-all.They will have no authority from Him to speak
On the Day when the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows. They will not speak except for those to whom the Merciful gives permission, and he will say what is right
That is the True Day; so whoever wills, may take now a way back to his Lord
We have warned you of an eminent punishment on the Day when a person will see what he has done, and the unbeliever will say, "I wish that I were dust
By those [stars] who rise only to sit
And move [in their orbits] steadily
And float [through space] smoothly
And yet some overtake [others] swiftly
Thus they fulfill the [Creator's] purpose
On the Day when the world will shudder
Followed by a tremor
Hearts, that Day, will shiver
and eyes are humbled
They say, "Are we to be restored to the original condition
After we have turned into decayed bones
They say, "This will be a losing come back
But all it will take is a single blast
and they will be awake and above ground
Has there the story of Moses reached you
When his Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa
Go to Pharaoh. For he has transgressed
and ask him, "Would you be willing to purify yourself
And I will guide you to your Lord so you would be in awe of Him
And he showed him the greatest sign
but Pharaoh rejected the offer and disobeyed
Then he hastily turned away
and gathered [his people] and proclaimed
I am your lord, the most high
So God seized him with punishment, as an example, in the life to come as well as in this life
In this, there is a warning for whomever would fear [God]
Are you more difficult to create or is the heaven that He built
He raised it high and proportioned it
He darkened its night and brought out its morning light
After that He spread out the earth
From it, He produced its water and its pasture
And He set the mountains firmly in place
for you and for your animals to enjoy
But when the Great Calamity arrives
a Day when the human being will remember what he has done
and Hell will be there for all to see
for him who transgressed
and preferred the life of this world
Hell will be his home
But as for him who feared to stand one day in front of his Lord and therefore restrained himself from following his whims and desires
then Heaven will be home
They ask you about the Hour, "When will it take place
How can you possibly know that
Its time is only known to your Lord
You are only to warn those who dread it
On the Day they see it, it will seem as though they only stayed an evening or a morning
He frowned and turned away
when the blind man approached him
For all you know, he might be seeking to purify himself
or to be reminded and be helped by being reminded
As for him who was indifferent
you [Prophet] gave him your attention
Though it is not up to you whether or not he is purified
As for him who came to you eagerly
with God's fear in his heart
from him you are distracted
Indeed this is a reminder
So, whoever wills may remember it
it is [written] on honored sheets
Exalted and purified
by the hands of scribes
honorable and virtuous
How regretful it is for people to have so much self-destructive ingratitude
From what did He create him
From a fertilized ovum He created him and proportioned him
Then He eased the way for him
Then He causes him to die and to be buried
Then when He wills, He will resurrect him
No! He did not fulfill what He has commanded him
A human being has only to consider the food he eats
We poured down water in abundance
and caused the soil to break open
and grew grains in it
and grapes and legumes
olive and dates
and luxurious gardens
and fruits and vegetable
for you and your livestock to enjoy
But when the Deafening Blast comes
on the Day when a human being will flee from his brother
his mother, his father
his wife and his children
every one of them, on that Day, will have enough to preoccupy him
Faces on that Day will be beaming
laughing and rejoicing
And [other] faces, on that Day, will be covered with dust
overwhelmed by sorrow
These are the unbelievers, the wicked ones
When the sun folds
and the stars are dispersed
when the mountains are shifting
and when full-term she-camels are neglected
When the wild beasts are gathered
when the seas are set aflame
when the souls are paired
when the female baby who was buried alive is asked
for what sin she was killed
When the records are made public
when the sky is stripped away
when Hell is set ablaze
when Paradise is brought into view
every soul will then know what it has brought with it
I swear by the planets
the runners and sweepers
and by the night as it recedes
and the dawn when it breathes
this revelation is indeed the word of a honorable Messenger
endowed with strength, secure with the Lord of the Throne
obeyed and trustworthy
This fellow of yours is not mad
he has already seen him [Gabriel] in the clear horizon
He does not withhold what is revealed to him from beyond
And it (the Qur'an) is not the word of a devil, expelled from Heaven
So where, then, will you go
It is only a reminder to all humankind
for whoever wills among you to go straight
But you cannot will, unless God, the Lord of the worlds, so wills
When the heavens are torn apart
when the planets are sprinkled
when the oceans are exploded
when the graves are scattered
each soul will then know what it has sent on ahead and what it has left behind
People, what has lured you away from your Lord, the Most Generous
He Who created you, formed you, and proportioned you
In whatever shape He willed, He assembled you
Yet you still deny the Judgment
When guardians are standing over you
honorable recorders
They know everything you do
Indeed, the truly good will be in bliss
while the wicked will be in Hell
They will roast in it on the Day of Judgment
and will never get away from it
And how would you know what is the Day of Judgment
Truly, how would you know what is the Day of Judgment
It is the Day when no soul will be able to do anything for another soul; and the decision on that Day is God's alone
How terrible it is to those who give short measures
who, when they take a measure from people, take in full
But when they measure or weigh for others, they cheat
Don't such people realize that they will be resurrected
for a grievous Day
the Day when Humankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds
Indeed, the record of the wicked is in Sijjeen
And how would you know what Sijjeen is
It is a locked-in digital data record
How terrible it is that Day for the deniers
who deny the Day of Judgment
when only sinful aggressors deny it
When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of ancient people
Not at all! Rather, their hearts have become encrusted by what they were earning
They will be separated from their Lord, that Day
Then, they will be rekindling Hell
They will be then told, "This is what you used to deny
No indeed! The righteous' record is in 'Illiyyun
And how would you know what is Illiyyun
It is a digital data record
open to be witnessed by those brought near [to God]
Indeed, the righteous will be in perfect bliss
seated on couches, looking around
You will recognize the radiance of bliss on their faces
They will be given pure virgin nectar to drink
leaving a great taste in the mouth. Let people with aspirations, aspire to that
It is mixed with the water from Tasneem
a spring from which those near [to God] drink
Those who rejected the faith and severed their relation with God used to laugh at those who believed
They would wink at one another when the believers passed by them
joking about them when they returned to their people
And if they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost
Yet, they were not sent as guardians over them
So today those who believed will laugh at the unbelievers
while seated on luxurious furnishings, looking around
Have the unbelievers been rewarded for their deeds
When the sky is ruptured
obeying its Lord, as it is bound to do
When the earth is leveled out
and has cast out what is in it, and becomes empty
obeying its Lord as it is bound to do
O human being, you are laboring toward your Lord and you will meet Him
Then, as for him who is given his record in his right hand
he will have an easy settlement
and will return to his family delighted
But, as for him who is given his record behind his back
he will cry out for destruction
and will rekindle the Blaze
He used to be happy among his family
He thought he would never return [to His Lord]
Yes he will! His Lord was always watching him
So I swear by the twilight glow
and the night and all it gathers
and the moon when it is full
you will move onward from stage to stage
So what is the matter with them that they do not believe
and when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not bow down [to God]
But the unbelievers say it is lies
but God knows best what they comprehend
So give them the news of a painful punishment
except for those who believe and do good deeds. They will have a never ending reward
By the heavens full of great constellations
by the promised Day
and by the witness and the witnessed
how terrible were the people of the trench
[using] fire supplied with fuel
while they sat around it
to watch what they were doing to the believers
The only reason they punish them was because they believed in God, the Almighty, the Praiseworthy
to whom belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. God, is Witness over all things
Those who persecute believing men and women, and have not repented afterwards, will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of Burning
Indeed, those who believe and do good deeds will have Gardens with rivers flowing through them. That is the great victory
Your Lord's punishment is truly severe
It is He who begins [Creation] and repeats it
He alone is Truly-Forgiving, All-Embracing in His love
The Glorious Lord of the Throne
Doer of whatever He wills
Has the story of the legions reached you
[those of] Pharaoh and Thamud
Yet those who denied the truth are persistent in denial
while God will encircle them from behind
This is indeed a Glorious Qur'an
in a Preserved Tablet
By the sky and the knocking star
